messages.content:
%ec%a2%8b%ec%8a%b5%eb%8b%88%eb%8b%a4, REST API%ec%97%90 %ea%b4%80%ed%95%9c %ec%b6%94%ec%b2%9c %eb%8f%84%ec%84%9c 3%ea%b6%8c%ec%9e%85%eb%8b%88%eb%8b%a4.

1. %22RESTful Web APIs%22 %2d Leonard Richardson%ea%b3%bc Mike Amundsen%ec%9d%b4 %ec%93%b4 %ec%b1%85%ec%9e%85%eb%8b%88%eb%8b%a4. RESTful %ec%9b%b9 API%eb%a5%bc %eb%94%94%ec%9e%90%ec%9d%b8%ed%95%98%ea%b3%a0 %ea%b5%ac%ec%84%b1%ed%95%98%ea%b3%a0 %ec%9c%a0%ec%a7%80%ed%95%98%eb%8a%94 %eb%b0%a9%eb%b2%95%ec%97%90 %eb%8c%80%ed%95%b4 %ec%83%81%ec%84%b8%ed%95%98%ea%b2%8c %ec%84%a4%eb%aa%85%ed%95%a9%eb%8b%88%eb%8b%a4.
2. %22API Design for C%2b%2b%22 %2d Martin Reddy%ea%b0%80 %ec%93%b4 %ec%b1%85%ec%9e%85%eb%8b%88%eb%8b%a4. C%2b%2b%ec%9d%84 %ec%82%ac%ec%9a%a9%ed%95%98%ec%97%ac REST API %eb%94%94%ec%9e%90%ec%9d%b8%ea%b3%bc %ea%b5%ac%ed%98%84%ec%9d%84 %eb%b0%b0%ec%9a%b0%ea%b3%a0 %ec%8b%b6%ec%9d%80 %ea%b0%9c%eb%b0%9c%ec%9e%90%ec%97%90%ea%b2%8c %ec%a0%81%ed%95%a9%ed%95%a9%eb%8b%88%eb%8b%a4. %ec%a2%8b%ec%9d%80 API %eb%94%94%ec%9e%90%ec%9d%b8 %ec%9b%90%ec%b9%99%ea%b3%bc %ec%8b%a4%ec%a0%9c %ec%98%88%ec%a0%9c%eb%a5%bc %eb%8b%a4%eb%a3%b9%eb%8b%88%eb%8b%a4.
3. %22RESTful API Design%3a Best Practices in API Design with REST%22 %2d Jordan P. Evans%ea%b0%80 %ec%93%b4 %ec%b1%85%ec%9e%85%eb%8b%88%eb%8b%a4. %ed%99%95%ec%9e%a5 %ea%b0%80%eb%8a%a5%ed%95%98%ea%b3%a0 %ec%9c%a0%ec%a7%80 %eb%b3%b4%ec%88%98%ea%b0%80 %ec%9a%a9%ec%9d%b4%ed%95%98%eb%a9%b0 %ec%82%ac%ec%9a%a9%ed%95%98%ea%b8%b0 %ec%89%ac%ec%9a%b4 %ea%b3%a0%ed%92%88%ec%a7%88 REST API%eb%a5%bc %ea%b5%ac%ec%b6%95%ed%95%98%eb%8a%94 %eb%8d%b0 %ec%8b%a4%ec%9a%a9%ec%a0%81%ec%9d%b8 %ec%a7%80%ec%b9%a8%ec%9d%84 %ec%a0%9c%ea%b3%b5%ed%95%a9%eb%8b%88%eb%8b%a4. %ec%9e%90%ec%9b%90 %eb%aa%a8%eb%8d%b8%eb%a7%81, %eb%b2%84%ec%a0%84 %ea%b4%80%eb%a6%ac, %ec%9d%b8%ec%a6%9d %eb%b0%8f %ec%98%a4%eb%a5%98 %ec%b2%98%eb%a6%ac%ec%99%80 %ea%b0%99%ec%9d%80 %ec%a3%bc%ec%a0%9c%eb%a5%bc %eb%8b%a4%eb%a3%b9%eb%8b%88%eb%8b%a4.
